com.basho.riak.client.query

Class LinkWalkStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.query.LinkWalkStep

  • public class LinkWalkStep
extends Object
    Used internally by LinkWalk to model a step in a link walk operation.
    Author:
    russell
    See Also:
    LinkWalk#addStep(String, String, Accumulate), LinkWalk.addStep(String, String), LinkWalk.addStep(String, String, boolean)

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LinkWalkStep.Accumulate
      Enum for the accumulate specification of a link walk step.
